thread.title: Labor Day Sale underway at Toyota of Naperville
thread.title_full: Labor Day Sale underway at Toyota of Naperville

author: admin
title: Labor Day Sale underway at Toyota of Naperville
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Toyota of Naperville 
NAPERVILLE, Ill., Aug. 31, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- There is a lot to be excited about at Toyota of Naperville. First, the dealership is well on its way, offering people additional help in getting behind the wheel of certain selected vehicles. Additionally, more 2016 models are arriving to the dealership. Each 2016 Toyota that received an upgrade, isn't going to change much from an exterior point of view. However, there are a number of vehicles that are getting new features and mechanical upgrades to help increase capability overall. This is a very exciting time to be a Toyota of Naperville customer, whether someone in getting a 2016 Toyota car, truck or SUV or simply looking to save a little more money on a vehicle purchase. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150831/262249 
The Labor Day Bonus Cash Offer in Naperville, IL runs through next weekend, ending on Sept. 8. This means customers of Toyota of Naperville have a little more than a week to take a look at new, never before owned 2015 models of the Toyota Camry, Toyota Camry Hybrid and Toyota RAV4. Each one of these models has an additional $500 bonus to offer well qualified customers, in addition to almost any other rebate, special or incentive is already on the vehicle. 
Toyota of Naperville is excite to announced that the 2016 Toyota Tundra is now available in its showroom. For the new model-year, Toyota engineers have made the fuel tank larger on versions of the full-size pickup truck with the 5.7-liter, V-8 engine. This means that the 38-gallon fuel tank on the new Tundra is now the largest one that can be found in the full-size pickup truck class. Additionally, Toyota has expanded the options for the Toyota Entune system. Tundra owners can now access more applications and other benefits of the Toyota Entune system. 
Anyone can view the Toyota of Naperville inventory by visiting the website, www.toyotaofnaperville.com . The showroom is located at 1488 West Ogden Avenue, Naperville, IL 60540. Customers with questions about the Labor Day Cash Bonus or the 2016 Toyota Tundra can contact a Toyota of Naperville sales professional by calling 855-475-0344. 
Media Contact: Tom Gregg, Toyota of Naperville, 855-475-0344, tgregg@napervilletoyota.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Toyota of Naperville
